articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Special counsel urges US Supreme Court to reject Trump immunity bid
articles.description: The special counsel pursuing federal criminal charges against Donald Trump for his efforts to overturn his 2020 election loss filed a U.S. Supreme Court brief on Monday urging the justices to reject the former president's bid for immunity from prosecution on the principle that "no person is above the law." The case is due to be argued before the justices on April 25.
